sentence: rotate the middle blue block by -30 degrees and align it with the rear side of the rear yellow block
move the front yellow block to the front right side of the workspace
move the leftmost green block so that one corner touches the rear right corner of the blue block you moved before
move the rightmost blue block so that one corner touches the rear left corner of the leftmost green block
place the yellow block that you did not touch yet to the top of the yellow block you moved before
move the rightmost green block to the front side of the blue block in the left center
